##Visualizing the decision tree regression results
```{r}

library(ggplot2)
ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = dataset$Level, y = dataset$Salary),
             colour ='red') +
  geom_line(aes(dataset$Level, y = predict(regressor, newdata = dataset)),
            colour = 'blue') +
  ggtitle('Truth or Bluff (Decision Tree Regression Model)') +
  xlab('Level') +
  ylab('Salary')

```

##Visualizing the decision tree regression results with a smooth curve // higher resolution
```{r}

library(ggplot2)
x_grid = seq(min(dataset$Level),max(dataset$Level),0.1)
ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = dataset$Level, y = dataset$Salary),
             colour ='red') +
  geom_line(aes(x_grid, y = predict(regressor, newdata = data.frame(Level = x_grid))),
            colour = 'blue') +
  ggtitle('Truth or Bluff (Decision Tree Regression Model)') +
  xlab('Level') +
  ylab('Salary')

```
